issues.title: Synonym types (common name, etc) are lost in OWL translation

commits.message: Merged synonym fix.
Minor fix to OBOUtils.

Merge pull request #7 from NESCent/commonNameFix

supports copying defined synonym types
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:NESCent/Taxonomy-Ontology-Tool
Small bugfix.

Merge pull request #6 from NESCent/commonNameFix

Common name fix
Updated run script.

issue_comments.body: If we have any data using NCBI identifiers, we may need to retain all the NCBITAXON_nnn identifiers as obsolete with the appropriate replaced_by tags.

issues.title: Proper capitalization in NCBITaxon prefixes
issues.body:
Chris Mungal:
As an aside, I note that VTO uses URIs of the form NCBITAXON_nnn - for historic reasons it's NCBITaxon_nnn....

issues.title: vto generation needs an 'ontology' keyword in the header
issues.body: should have vto (or ato as appropriate) as the value in the ontology header

commits.message: supports copying defined synonym types (added MISSPELLING and TAXONNAMEUSAGE)
reduce PBDB chatter
Fix logic for matching synonym types and refactor
refactoring of previous change that passes common name synonyms through, also removed second copy appearing as synonym of default type
removed some dead code, fixed resource leaks reported by Eclipse
fixed/tested commonnames synonym bug
added code to properly handle common names in merges and attaches
bug fixes for NCBI Merger and enhancements to PBDB postprocessing
reorganization and ant script mods to make this build
catchup commit
Added support for obsoleting terms that are not restored after a trim - interface changed
drop description field, other reimplementation of column format support
Continuing reworking of column format processing
Start rework for processing amphibiaweb files (fix column format support)
update to add fishbase ids as xrefs and fix several issues with OWL conversion (loss of ranks, is_extinct as proper XSD:boolean).
add support for merge subactions (e.g., merge synonyms or xrefs to names)
add gitignore so Connection.properties doesn't get added and accidently report db credentials
Catchup commit
small changes to help localize a couple of null pointer errors
make sure NCBI ids are used when requested
Implemented partial support for PBDB post processing
maybe fixed attach problem?
reformating License file
catchup commit and added LICENSE.txt (MIT license)
bug fix for skipping isa links to extinct parent taxa
resolved some, but not all, issues related to merging multiple OBO taxonomies to an OBO target
cleanup of merger (especially OBOMerger) to match updated wiki documentation

Added a couple of new setters to Merger interface - one controls perserving IDs from merged sources, the other controls perserving synonyms.  Deleted a constants file that doesn't seem to be used anywhere.
Added code to convert taxa with dagger prefixes to extinct terms, working on attach rooting issue
tracked down some missing parents of extinct taxa in ATO
handling quirks with amphibiaweb dump with new tests
Testing with updated AmphibaWeb.txt - should work
Remove 'clade' as a subgeneric rank
Changes to support AmphibiaWeb update from David Blackburn
updates to column merger to support new amphibian dump
files can now be specified locally, some support for adding alternate ids
filling in unimplemented tests
Started cleaning up testing framework
Catchup before some reorganization
Final changes for taxon xrefs and synonyms from PaleoDB.
Added support for paleoDB ids and catching extinction status.  Also some reformatting.

Cleaned up orphan processing - from the Oct 24 download, there are now only 76 orphans, which seem to cases where the parent is nomen dubium, so how or whether to handle these are unclear.  For the present VTOtool will just filter them out rather than clutter up the default parent.
Problems with commas in references forced switch to pipe delimited dumps.
Checkpoint before switching back to all fields format (ITIS format is missing several necessary fields)
Continued work on PaleoDB Bulk Merger, also fixed problems with OBO->OBO taxonomy copy.
Continued on tree building; caught problem with parents only specified by name in dump files (not by id).
continued work on line parsing.
Refactoring of line parsing for PBDB bulk files (ITIS format).
started line parsing (with unit tests)
Retarget to use ITIS dump format - it now works and the 2 files required are simplier than their CSV counterparts.
Started work on build PBDB updater.
Started implementation of PaleoDB Merger.
ommit changes before extension of command file syntax (support synonoym column -> URI mapping)
Modify previous changes to merger interface.  Also simplify attach element delegation.

Refactoring of Merger interface so the merge() method doesn't have too many arguments - source and target are now set separately before calling merge.  Other class changes are result of Merger change.
Started implementation of the CoL Database Merger and did some refactoring in the part of Builder that traverses the XML parse tree.
Started adding support for MySQL access to Catalogue of Life and updated javadoc.
Started support for local Catalogue of Life database, added some comments.
Fixed bug where NCBI subspecies without a rank specifier (null or 'no rank') were not merged as synonyms with their parent species; also generated and added JavaDocs for the project.
Add sample config file, VSWG taxonomy, and README for github.
Remove old phenoscape test entries
fix packages in the java source
Rename project from phenoscape to nescent as this portion of the project was developed with Nescent sponsored science funds.
Catchup changes prior to renaming project from Phenoscape to NESCent
Lots of small changes and start of support for OWLStores.
Missed this unit test file
finish up CoL merger - read for long runs(?)
Commit near version for distribution of VTO to the VSWG.
Updates to get NCBI and OBO merging going.  Also adding JUnit stubs for all lib files.
This is a tool for building taxonomy ontologies by merging and attaching.

issue_comments.body: The VTOTool is generating ranks - as I work through the latest changes I'll try to catch where they disappear in the pipeline.
Equus also had this problem in October update.  This problem for genus and intermediate level taxon (between genus and species) is now caught and the intermediate is removed.
This was a problem at the obo -> owl conversion stage.  Removing the Typedef for has_rank in the OBO VTO resolved the problem.

I've checked - it looks like a problem in the build tool - it writes OBO ontologies with synonym types when present, but the copy process does not seem to preserve synonym types (so for example the ATO generated from the AmphbiaWeb taxonomy has common names, but they seem to disappear when the ATO (as an OBO file) is run through the VTO build.  So the problem is probably in the OBOmerger module.
